trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode> event to customize the appearance of nodes in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control using owner drawing.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode>evento para personalizar o aspeto de nós num <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controlo utilizando o desenho de proprietário.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode> event is raised by a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control when its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName> and a node is displayed or updated.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode>o evento é gerado por um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controlar quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName>e um nó é apresentado ou atualizado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode>

trans-unit.source: The DrawTreeNodeEventArgs passed to the event handler contains information about the node to draw as well as providing methods to help you draw the node.
trans-unit.target: DrawTreeNodeEventArgs transmitido para o processador de eventos contém informações sobre o nó para desenhar, bem como fornecer métodos para o ajudar a desenhar o nó.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.State%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Node%2A> properties to retrieve information about the node to draw.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.State%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Node%2A>Propriedades para obter informações sobre o nó para desenhar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Node%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Graphics%2A> property to do the actual drawing within the area specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Graphics%2A>propriedade para fazer o desenho real na área de especificado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Graphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: To make the operating system draw a node that does not need to be owner drawn, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.DrawDefault%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para tornar o sistema operativo desenhar um nó que não precisa de ser proprietário desenhado, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.DrawDefault%2A>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.DrawDefault%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName>, the area indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property includes the label portion of the node only.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName>, a área indicado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A>propriedade inclui a parte da etiqueta do nó apenas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A> area includes the entire node, including the area typically used for icons, checkboxes, plus and minus signs, and lines connecting the nodes.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName>, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A>área inclui o nó completo, incluindo a área normalmente utilizada para ícones, as caixas de verificação, mais e menos inicia e ligar os nós de linhas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Bounds%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> surface on which to draw.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> superfície no qual desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> within which to draw.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> no qual desenhar.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeStates"></xref> values indicating the current state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeStates"> </xref> valores que indica o estado atual do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size and location of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho e a localização do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The location specified by this property is relative to the upper-left corner of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: A localização especificada por esta propriedade é relativo para o canto superior esquerdo do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>, the area specified by the Bounds property is the region in which a node can be clicked to select it.
trans-unit.target: Quando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>, área especificada pela propriedade limites é a região em que um nó pode ser clicado para o selecionar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you draw outside this hit test region, you should provide your own code for selecting a node when its visible area is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Se desenhar fora desta região de acessos de teste, deve fornecer o seu próprio código para selecionar um nó quando for clicada respectiva área visível.

trans-unit.source: You may also want to provide your own hit test code when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>.
trans-unit.target: Também poderá fornecer o seu próprio teste acessos code quando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewDrawMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In this mode, the Bounds property encompasses the whole node across the entire width of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control, rather than the just hit test region.
trans-unit.target: Neste modo, a propriedade de limites abrange o nó todo em toda a largura de toda o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controlar, em vez da região de teste apenas acessos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa os limites do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> should be drawn by the operating system rather than being owner drawn.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> deve ser desenhada pelo sistema operativo em vez de ser proprietário desenhado.

trans-unit.source: Set this property to `true` for nodes that you do not want to customize when you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode> event.
trans-unit.target: Defina esta propriedade como `true` para nós que não pretende personalizar quando para processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode>

trans-unit.source: For example, this is useful when you want to customize only nodes that are in a specific state.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, isto é útil quando pretender personalizar apenas nós que estão num estado específico.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the node should be drawn by the operating system; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the node will be drawn in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o nó deve ser desenhado pelo sistema operativo; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se o nó será desenhado o processador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object used to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> objecto utilizado para desenhar o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class provides properties and methods useful for drawing on the display device.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>classe fornece métodos útil para desenhar no dispositivo de apresentação e propriedades.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> object to draw.
trans-unit.target: Utilize esta propriedade para aceder a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>objeto para desenhar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.State%2A> property does not provide adequate information to meet your needs.
trans-unit.target: Isto é útil quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.State%2A>propriedade não fornecem informações adequadas para satisfazer as suas necessidades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.State%2A> property provides only basic state information that you can use, for example, to determine whether a node is selected, checked, or focused.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.State%2A>propriedade fornece apenas as informações de estado básico que pode utilizar, por exemplo, para determinar se um nó é selecionado, marcado ou focado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Node property, on the other hand, allows you to access all members of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de nó, por outro lado, permite-lhe aceder a todos os membros de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: You must access the node directly, for example, when you want to determine its expansion state.
trans-unit.target: Tem de aceder o nó diretamente, por exemplo, quando pretende determinar o estado de expansão.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado atual do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to check whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> object to draw is in a particular state.
trans-unit.target: Utilize esta propriedade para verificar se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>objeto para desenhar está num estado específico.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: This property provides only basic state information about the node.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade fornece apenas as informações de estado básico sobre o nó.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property, for example, to determine whether a node is selected, checked, or focused.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar esta propriedade, por exemplo, para determinar se um nó é selecionado, marcado ou concentra-se.

trans-unit.source: If you need to know more, retrieve the node through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Node%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se precisar de saber mais, obter o nó através do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Node%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawTreeNodeEventArgs.Node%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, to determine whether the node is expanded, you must retrieve the node and check the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.IsExpanded%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, para determinar se o nó é expandido, terá de obter o nó e verifique o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.IsExpanded%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.IsExpanded%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeStates"></xref> values indicating the current state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeStates"> </xref> valores que indica o estado atual do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref>.
